title: Leeds Glass Recycling
strapline: Brought to you by Zero Waste Leeds
welcome_message:
Last year we recycled over XXXX tonnes of glass across our city – an increase of over XX% over the year before. That’s great because glass is one of the most important things we can recycle – not only does it reduce landfill it also achieves some big CO₂ and energy savings.

 Use the map to find your nearest location for glass recycling and discover how much was recycled there and how much energy it saved.
